tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GreenhouseGasEmissions (
  source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(255),
  emission_type VARCHAR(50),
  emission_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  measurement_unit VARCHAR(20) 
);

CREATE TABLE emission_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    emission_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES greenhouse_sources(source_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES emission_categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EmissionReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_id INT NOT NULL,
  category_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  emission_quantity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Emission_Reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id INT NOT NULL,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_emission DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES Greenhouse_Gas_Emission_Sources(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Source_Categories (
    source_id INT NOT NULL,
    category_id INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (source_id, category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES Greenhouse_Gas_Emission_Sources(source_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES Emission_Categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Emission_History (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT NOT NULL,
    emission_date DATE NOT NULL,
    emission_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES Emission_Reports(report_id)
);
